Package ca.mcgill.splendorserver.models.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.splendorserver.models.cards.Card
  • public class Card
extends Object
    Model class for a Splendor development card.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card​(int id,
            int pts,
            String bonusType,
            int bonusAmount,
            int blue,
            int green,
            int red,
            int white,
            int black,
            String type,
            String level)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - card's identification number as assigned in GameController's CardRegistry
        pts - the points awarded upon card acquisition
        bonusType - colour of bonus awarded upon card acquisition
        bonusAmount - the amount of bonuses awarded upon card acquisition
        blue - blue tokens cost
        green - green tokens cost
        red - red tokens cost
        white - white tokens cost
        black - black tokens cost
        type - special abilities of card
        level - base game or expansion plus the level of the card (relevant to the card's deck)

      • Card

        public Card​(org.json.simple.JSONObject obj,
            CardLevel level)
        Constructor from a JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        obj - the JSONObject with the card data
        level - the level of the card

      • getCost

        public HashMap<Token,​Integer> getCost()
        Getter for the cost of the card.
        Returns:

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Card other)
        Compares two card.
        Parameters:
        other - the card to compare to this one
        Returns:
        whether they have the same id given that ids uniquely identify a card
